snippet: The world’s largest steel maker cites falling demand and low Chinese export prices as major challenges. Sales in the quarter fell to $15.6 billion.
abstract: Steel maker ArcelorMittal reports third-quarter loss of $700 million, compared with profit of $22 million for year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: The world’s largest steel maker cites falling demand and low Chinese export prices as major challenges. Sales in the quarter fell to $15.6 billion.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Steel Maker ArcelorMittal Reports $700 Million Loss
